The master password is required to generate the old and new password.

The version of a password is a number that indicates how many passwords an account has had. It is used to generate a different password even if neither the master password nor any other data regarding the account is changed.

What is Privacy Friendly Password Generator?
Privacy Friendly Password Generator generates unique passwords for all your accounts. After generation you have to enter the password manually to the website or service.
How do I generate a password?

To generate a password choose an account out of the list and click on it. Enter your master password and then press the "generate" button. The password can than be copied to website or service by writing or the using the clipboard.

Website providers often use password composition policies. These policies should direct our password choices and might force us to create passwords with special characteristics like a minimum length. An account describes properties of the generated password.
Which properties of a password can be chosen?
The account name is reference to the website or item the password is used for.
The optional username can be used to distinguish between different users for the same account name.
The character set describes which types of characters should be included into the password. Websites often have recommendations regarding the character set of a password.
The length of the password can be chosen between 4 and 25.

The password version is required to generate different passwords with the same account data in case of an update. The default value is 1. The counter is incremented by one on every update, but can also be changed manually.
How can I add an account?
Add a new account by pressing the plus button.
How can I update an account?
Update an account set by a long press on the list item.
How can I delete an account?
Delete an account set by swiping to one side.
The passwords are generated by a combination of two hashing algorithms: PBKDF2 and BCrypt. The master password serves as secret for both algorithms. The seeds are derived from the account data.
Are the passwords stored on the device?
No. Neither the passwords, nor the master password are stored on the device.
Which permissions are required by Privacy Friendly Password Generator?
Privacy Friendly Password Generator does not require any permission.
Do you really wish to delete all accounts?
Bind all passwords to the device
This creates unique passwords based on the device. The passwords cannot be regenerated by using another device and the same account data.
All other apps will have access to your password on the clipboard.
Changing the hash algorithm and number of iterations will generate different password and has a high influence on the time needed for generating the password.
Test the duration of generating based on the given algorithm and iteration.
With Privacy Friendly Password Generator you can generate different passwords for all your accounts while remembering only one master password.
Choose an account from the list.
Invent a master password as your initial secret. Based on this master password all other passwords are generated.
Copy the generated password to the website or service.
Website providers often use password composition policies.
These policies should direct our password choices and might force us to create passwords with special characteristics like a minimum length.
Characteristics of a password can be set in the account.
Add a new account with the plus button.
Update an account by a long press.
Delete an account by a swiping gesture from the right to the left.
The master password is the only password, that you have to remember.
Based on it all other passwords are generated.
The master password is not stored in the application. If you loose it you have to reset all your passwords.
If you wish you can write it down and keep it in a safe place.
Do not include personal data (like birthdays).
Do not use character sequences from the keyboard.
Try to make it as long as possible for you.
